description: This is a market on who will win in the FTX Crypto Cup preliminary match-up between Alireza Firouzja and Anish Giri, scheduled to take place on May 24, 2021 at 1:00 PM ET. The market will resolve to “Firouzja” if Alireza Firouzja wins, or “Giri” if Anish Giri wins. If the preliminary game is a draw, the market will resolve to 50 cents Firouzja and 50 cents Giri. If the preliminary game is postponed to a day on or before May 31, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the preliminary game is postponed to a day after May 31, 2021, or is cancelled altogether, the market will resolve to 50 cents Firouzja and 50 cents Giri. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

markets.question: Will Alireza Firouzja or Anish Giri win in their FTX Crypto Cup preliminary game?
